title: Al-Qaida Operative Says Saudi Royal Family Helped Fund Sept. 11 Attacks
teaser: Zacarias Moussaoui claims the Saudi Arabian royal family helped fund the Sept. 11 attacks. Audie Cornish talks to Gregory Gause, a professor of international studies at Texas A&M University.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
